concept.title: Where to find more information
concept.shortdesc: You can find other product publications that might be helpful when developing applications and systems that exploit the Crypto Express features.

conbody.p: While there is substantial commonality in the API supported by the products, and while this document seeks to guide you to the subset supported by , other individual product publications might provide further insight into potential issues of compatibility.
Other documents referenced in this book are:

li.cite: CCA Basic Services Reference and Guide for the IBM 4767 and IBM 4765 PCIe Cryptographic Coprocessors

xref.cite: z/OS Cryptographic Services ICSF Trusted Key Entry Workstation User’s Guide
z/OS Cryptographic Services publications for ICSF

ul.li:
See the following web site for distribution-specific documentation about :
Distributions
